name: DexManagerFacet
description: Optics Router Facet. Facet contract for managing approved DEXs to be used in swaps.

functionDecorators.name: addDex
functionDecorators.description: Register the address of a DEX contract to be approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dex
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the DEX contract to be approved.

functionDecorators.name: batchAddDex
functionDecorators.description: Batch register the addresss of DEX contracts to be approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dexs
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the DEX contracts to be approved.

functionDecorators.name: batchRemoveDex
functionDecorators.description: Batch unregister the addresses of DEX contracts approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dexs
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the DEX contracts to be unregistered.

functionDecorators.name: removeDex
functionDecorators.description: Unregister the address of a DEX contract approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dex
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the DEX contract to be unregistered.
